links.*: Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|July}}
Events that occurred on 28 July
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1905]]''' - Actor [[Lockwood West]] is born.
* '''[[1922]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] agrees to review ''[[Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem]]''.
* '''[[1939]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] performs [[Wikipedia:Geoffrey Chaucer|Chaucer]]'s ''[[Wikipedia:The Reeve's Tale|The Reeve's Tale]]'' at the 'Summer Diversions' - a festival of recitals, plays and ballet.
* '''[[1940]]''' - Actor [[Phil Proctor]] is born.
* '''[[1943]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49a]].
* '''[[1944]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 76]].
* '''[[1947]]''' – [[Rayner Unwin]] reports on the first version of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* '''[[1955]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mrs Dixey|a letter to Mrs Dixey]].
* '''[[1955]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith (28 July 1955)|a letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith]].
* '''[[1965]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 274]].
* '''[[1967]]''' - ''[[The Ballad of Bilbo Baggins]]'' is performed by [[Leonard Nimoy]] in the TV-show ''[[wikipedia:Malibu U|Malibu U]]''.
* '''[[1973]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Campbell]].
* '''[[1980]]''' - [[Mythcon 11]] at [[wikipedia:University of Nevada, Reno|University of Nevada]], [[wikipedia:Reno, Nevada|Reno]].
* '''[[1985]]''' - [[Mythcon 16]] in [[wikipedia:Wheaton, Illinois|Wheaton]], [[wikipedia:Illinois|Illinois]].
* '''[[1989]]''' - [[Mythcon 20]] at [[wikipedia:University of British Columbia|University of British Columbia]], [[wikipedia:Vancouver|Vancouver]].
* '''[[1991]]''' - [[Mythcon 22]] in [[wikipedia:San Diego|San Diego]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1996]]''' - [[Mythcon 27]] at [[wikipedia:University of Colorado at Boulder|University of Colorado]] in [[wikipedia:Boulder, Colorado|Boulder, Colorado]].
* '''[[2002]]''' - [[Mythcon 33]] in [[wikipedia:Boulder, Colorado|Boulder]], [[wikipedia:Colorado|Colorado]].
* '''[[2003]]''' - [[Mythcon 34]] in [[wikipedia:Nashville, Tennessee|Nashville]], [[wikipedia:Tennessee|Tennessee]].
* '''[[2006]]''' - ELF 2006 in [[wikipedia:Secaucus, New Jersey|Secaucus]], [[wikipedia:New Jersey|New Jersey]].
* '''[[2007]]''' - [[MerpCon III]] in [[wikipedia:Spokane, Washington|Spokane]], [[wikipedia:Washington (state)|Washington]].
* '''[[2016]]''' - ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]'' is published for the first time as a stand-alone volume.
* '''[[2022]]''' - Voice actor [[Bernard Cribbins]] dies
